name: Hide Closed Tasks
description:
Hide the tasks that are closed from the task view.
Does this need a form element? Since I'm the only one use this, probably not. We can query for them if we want to see. They will show up in all other views. It doesn't need to be in the active task list.
If we figure out how to handle filtering / multiple views, then we can come back. But his works for now.
